title: Drawing, "Design for a Soup Tureen (plan)", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink, rose ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink at lower center: SOUPIERE 2/PLAN; at lower right J.P. 36/[square root sign] 2.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Rectangular soup tureen drawn in plan surrounded by a cylindrical handle. Detail of handle and body of tureen impossible to read.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Soup Tureen (plan)", ca. 1920–40.
ca. 1920–40. Pen and black ink, rose ink, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-33.
